SEARCH
Package source.Entity

Class Suggestion

java.lang.Object
source.Entity.Suggestion
public class Suggestion extends Object
The Suggestion class holds information about suggestions made to a camp by a particular student.
Since:
11/4/2023
Author:
Pan Haolun

  • Constructor Details

    • Suggestion

      public Suggestion(String campName, String createdBy, String repliedBy, String content, boolean isProcessed, boolean isApproved, LocalDate createdDate, LocalDate repliedDate)
      An overloaded constructor that initializes a suggestion based on some values
      Parameters:
      campName - The name of the camp that this suggestion belongs to.
      createdBy - The user ID of the student that created this enquiry
      repliedBy - Denotes the user id of who replied to this enquiry ( a staff id )
      content - The content of the enquiry
      isProcessed - A boolean to determine whether the suggestion has been processed or not
      isApproved - A boolean to determine whether the suggestion has been processed or not
      createdDate - The local date timestamp of when the enquiry was created
      repliedDate - The local date timestamp of when the enquiry was replied
